name: TT
description:
TT --> Transmission Tracer You need to find the correct Freq and analysis it to unlock the mystery chat! (Psss try freq 010.50)

Note: the game is not complete... its missing huge part of the story and it include some bugs... we couldn't finish it in time.. 

feel free to learn from the source code here (https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/tt)

We may return and complete this game in future...Thanks for your support ^_^
